author: psmith
msg: For consistency, this Listener interface should extend
from EventListener interface (and the swing EventListenerList
support/delegate class requires this, handy for marking anyway).

author: psmith
msg: Added LoggerNameTreeModel and associated infrastructure.
Work in progress.
The rationale here is to provide a thin interface
that represents something containing a set of Logger names
which can notify listeners when a new, unique Logger name
turns up in the container.
The Model side of thing then can be notified of the new
Logger name arriving via the receiving events, and
adjust itself accordingly.
This TreeModel will then be used to allow the user to
specify which Logger's to display, and at what Level
to display them

author: psmith
msg: Marked the SocketHubReceiver as implementing the PortBased
interface, since it already supported all the methods
of that interface it was just a matter of marking it as such.
Chainsaw uses the interface to determine what actions
are allowed/appropriate for the GUI.

author: psmith
msg: exposed as public the default port number for this appender.
This is useful for Chainsaw etc.  Since it is static final,
it should be ok.

author: psmith
msg: When there is no Receivers defined, it was saying "(Unknow Type)::..." which is a bit silly
Also ensured appropriate Icon is used, a couple of spots
it was using inappropriate icons.
Also added Tooltip text to each Receiver node so the user
has a bit more idea about what they can do.
